丳字的基本解释

丳
chǎn
烤肉用的铁扦。

丳字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chǎn］
［《廣韻》初限切，上産，初。］
(1)以铁签串物烧烤。
(2)指串物烧烤的铁签状器具。
(3)通“串”。贯穿。
(4)通“串”。旧时制钱一千文之称。

丳字的康熙字典解释

【子集上】【丨字部】　丳； 康熙笔画：8； 页码：页80第04
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】楚限切【正韻】楚?切，?音鏟。燔肉器。【韓愈·贈張籍詩】試將詩義授，如以肉貫丳。【註】言愈兒子侍籍，籍授兒詩，義有條貫也。

丳字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
丳字的起名意思

暂无。

skewer
Basic explanation of words
skewer
chǎn
Iron skewer for barbecue.
skewer
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chǎn］
["Guangyun" is limited to the first cut, the first production, the beginning. ]
(1) Barbecue with iron skewers.
(2) Refers to the iron tag-shaped utensils used for grilling skewers.
(3) Through "string". Run through.
(4) Through "string". In the old days, it was called a thousand liters of money.
skewer

[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] Chu limit cut [Zheng Yun] Chu cut, sound shovel. Burnt device. 【Han Yu·Gifts from Zhang Ji Poems】Try to teach the meaning of the poem, such as using the meat to pass the poem. [Note] Yanyu's son serves as a servant, and he teaches poems for children, and his righteousness is organized.
